The Jackal Rickshaw is our newest edition to our rental fleet, engineered and designed by us at OSProducts. The Jackal Rickshaw was designed to be completely tooless, modular and still fully functioning, it succeeds in all aspects. DescriptionText:

Comes with Balloon Wheels and a Garfield 3-way leveller as standard.
Name: Mantis Rickshaw

DescriptionText:
The LUMI-POD 100 is a dedicated Remote Head for large heavy Stage lights up to 65 kg that need to be panned and tilted in real time to follow live action.

The LUMI-POD 100 uses the heavy-duty gearboxes of the POWERPOD 600 that can carry up to 100 kg with ease.

Its tubular chassis with adjusting clamps make changing for different lamp size and balance simple.

The introduction of Volume Screen Technology highlighted the need to be able to Pan and Tilt large lights that can follow on set movement. These lights were not designed with remote heads in mind but usually to be mounted on a yoke assembly that would be mounted on a lighting stand or static lighting truss. Unlike fitting a camera to a remote head, large lights are often best mounted by clamping to both the top and the bottom of the lamp chassis. This is made easy by the many clamping options that the LUMI-POD 100 offers. Its easily adjusted for size chassis, gives a safe and reliable system that is both practical and versatile.

The LUMI-POD 100 travels on its own transport dolly with the lamp already fitted if needed.
Name: Lumi-Pod 100

DescriptionText: The Chapman Leonard 2 axis remote head is a powerful and reliable tool for professional cinematographers. It features back pan compensation and 15 degrees of leveling in both directions, allowing cinematographers to quickly adjust the level of their shots. Its powerful motors enable it to handle heavy camera payloads, and limits can be set on all its axis. This remote head is offered in Aluminum and Magnesium, weight is the primary difference. In addition, there’s a variety of sizes, Standard, Mini, and our XL system is often used for lighting rigs.  The CL head runs from lithium batteries, is water resistant, and won’t drift during lock off shots. This makes it an ideal tool for its cost efficiency and build quality, truly supporting large lenses and fully built out camera bodies.
Features: Repeatable moves
Smooth, Silent Performance
Water Resistant
Name: CL MINI

DescriptionText: The Chapman Leonard 2 axis remote head is a powerful and reliable tool for professional cinematographers. DescriptionText: The G3 remote head has been a reliable choice for filmmakers and cinematographers over the years, even in the toughest of environments. The larger size of the G3 prevents any challenge of running with 1000-foot magazines. Its gyro stabilization can handle the most extreme off-road conditions. DescriptionText: The Amphibian is built in the USA by Chapman Leonard and offered in 2 and 3 axis when it arrives. Your qualified technician can help you choose the best application for your shoot. It is a fully submersible head that is perfectly paired with the 32′ Telescopic Hydrascope and sliding weight system. The Amphibians ability to handle water dives do to its incredibly powerful motors and strong build makes it the head of choice for underwater filming. The camera plate is adaptable to all hydroflex water housings with its universal plate. The amphibian can be used in salt water as well making it an ideal piece of equipment for underwater filming project.
Features: 3 axis Fully Submersible head also available in 2 axis configuration.
Engineered for Heavy payloads accepting light rigs or custom camera packages
Salt or fresh water compatible
Best used with 32’ Hydrascope crane with sliding weight system

DescriptionText:
Ultra high precision slider available in in lengths from 25” to 96”.  Supplied with precision ground stainless steel runners and rollers, 360 degree lockable rotation and adjustable magnetic stops.  Mitchell, 150m/m or 100m/m top fittings, support bars and slider friction units also available.

The Ronford-Baker Slider is available in many lengths and can be made to your specific requirements.

The slider is CNC machined from high tensile aluminium stress relieved ‘Tooling Plate’, and anodised to suit. Designed for maximised
carriage travel, with a minimum height of 4 ¾” (12 cm). Mitchell to Mitchell fitting, with an overall width of just 10″ (25 cm). The whole unit has a lockable rotation of 360 degrees.

Ultra high precision, ground stainless steel runners and rollers.
Features: 360 degree lockable rotation
‘Soft stop’ adjustable buffers or adjustable magnetic stops
Available in length from 640 mm (25″) to 2440 mm (8’)
‘Tritium’ spirit level
Mitchell to Mitchell fitting & 150m/m Bowl available for top
Linear damper available

DescriptionText: The Matrix™ is a 4-axis gimbal that offers outstanding stability and smooth movement in all directions. Its open architecture and redundant axis allow it to be mounted in any orientation while maintaining correct polarity of pan, tilt, and roll without gimbal lock. It is the first 4-axis gimbal to provide 360° continuous roll without needing a patch cable between the twist and tilt axes, making it perfect for handling large payloads, including all film cameras. The Matrix™ also supports true nodal positioning for most camera setups, ensuring maximum precision and versatility.4 Axis with full regard. No gimbal lock. Does not require level mounting point.
Features: Can obtain camera nodal on all axis.
Wireless control via proprietary system, WIFI or Bluetooth.
Android app-based operating system. (real time upgrades and modifications).
Carbon fibre construction.
Will carry IMAX and Most film cameras.
Can obtain camera nodal on all axis.
Two stabilization levels: Stealth mode for quiet settings and Ludacris mode for extremely fast pan rates and high G-force environments.
3” and 6” extenders for longer camera packages.
Name: Matrix

DescriptionText:
Mini Cooper Array Vehicle – for higher speed work / Plate Background Shot Work / Array Shooting. It is compact, maneuverable, with superb handling and features high acceleration and deceleration, ideally suited for Tracking Pursuit shots, 360-degree plate shots with (custom lowered windscreen), Circuit or Higher Speed Camera Tracking work. Camera Rigging plate / Moy Base Plate Height 105cm.

The Centre of the Moy plate to the rear of the car body is 170cm and to the front is 200cm. Lowest Available rigging. This can be carried on the sliding plate by 30cm.  

It is fitted with Scaffold Rigging Points, Front, Rear, Sides and Roll Cage (If required) for quick and easy camera rigging. Cameras and Remote heads can be mounted anywhere on the Mini Cooper with ease. All crew are carried within the car (Driver plus 3 Crew Max), the interior of the car is also fitted with various scaffold rigging points to accommodate remote head controls and monitors. We can supply Remote Head Mounts, these can be supplied at various heights and are adjustable for fixed positions.
Name: Mini Cooper S Plate Shot / Array Vehicle

DescriptionText:
The Discovery 4×4 Split Tailgate Tracking Vehicles (2x available Black or Grey in colour) are rigged for filming from the rear, and they can carry fixed cameras from the various scaffold rigging points front, rear and roof. The “Post” rig or Up and Down Camera Support rig can be rigged to these tracking vehicles. The floor in the rear is fitted with a multi-hole threaded rigging plate which can be used for mounting camera equipment and securing harnessing points for the operating crew.

The Grey Discovery has a removable rear window enabling you to film with the Spilt Tailgate fully closed – Much safer on longer tracking Shots, more covert filming and not distracting other road users

They can also Tow an “A” Frame or the Tracking Tow Dolly – can be used as a Non-Descript Lead Vehicle for forward facing “A” Frame Shots – Which can be further improved using the long “A” Frame.

Or it can carry Camera Gear Externally Either with Fixed Post Rig  – Or an Up and Down Rig 

They can Carry 2 crew in the working rear area. The passenger’s compartment can carry 3 crew plus driver

Ideally suited for low key shooting, Top Gear Style. Police / Local Authority Approval is still required for these tracking vehicles, the same procedures apply as any of our regular tracking vehicles being used on the public highway. They can also be used as Pursuit Vehicle / Tracking Vehicle Escort vehicle and be fitted with Orange Beacons – Good general Off Roads Vehicle.
Features: Fitted with EU Digital Tachograph for legally Towing Trailers
2 x Safety harnesses
Rigging Gear for Rigging Plate

DescriptionText:
The Cheyenne Tracking 4×4 is a multi-roll Tracking Vehicle. This vehicle can be used Off-Road on rough and muddy terrain, and is also ideal for location access with camera gear etc. Cheynne is quiet and fitted with air cushion suspension, which is adjustable to weight and ride comfort.

This vehicle can be used for all round camera tracking and “A” framing with interchangeable front or rear platforms. The generator (5 KW) is built in under the floor area of this tracking vehicle allowing more area for crew / equipment and in addition is much quieter. The carrying capacity on the rear work area of this vehicle is for 6 crew, plus equipment. The Crew Cab offers seating for a further 3 crew members plus Driver and has space for remote head controls, the cab area also has 240v supply, 12v supply and USB sockets.

The safety rails double as rigging points and offer endless opportunity for hard mounting of cameras, remote heads and other rigs. The Cheyenne can carry any jib arm, other manual cranes and up to a 22 Foot Techno crane.

The carrying capacity on this vehicle is for 6 people plus equipment. The Crew Cab offers seating for a further 3 crew members and has space for remote head controls

DescriptionText:
The HEXATRON from ARRI Rental is an exclusive, all-weather, go-anywhere crane positioning base. Suitable for use with telescopic and modular camera cranes, the heavy-duty, four-wheel drive vehicle allows elaborate crane shots to be achieved quickly and easily on the toughest terrain and at the most inaccessible locations.

Once in position, the vehicle base stabilizes itself with four hydraulic legs, which provide solid support. Then the custom-made six-arm HEXApod fixed to the vehicle base levels the crane mount itself. Other system components include the HEXAjuice power supply, HEXAbrake remote-controlled pan brake and dedicated road haulage truck.
Features: Quick and easy to operate at many different locations on a single day.
Strong climbing ability for year-round use on mountainous and hard-to-reach terrain.
Various steering modes and wheel configurations to suit different conditions.
Precise leveling of the crane achieved in minutes.
Can be safely driven off the set immediately after use with the crane still mounted, causing no delay to shooting.
The water wading depth of 60 cm and all-terrain tires eliminate logistical problems associated with harsh weather and sodden locations.
Name: Hexatron

DescriptionText:
The GF-Multi Jib is a professional, lightweight and modular Jib arm, suitable for carrying all general remote head systems. It is portable, mobile and mounts on most standard dollies fitted with Euro Adapter or Mitchell mounts.

The arm is stabilised with an easy to mount, rod rigging system. In general, the two 150 cm sections are used as front arm extensions whereas the 100, 50 and 30 cm sections function as both rear and front sections. Various configurations can be achieved by combining the sections, allowing the arm to be assembled to the required length.
Fulcrum to Short End: 4ft 2in (30cm Rear Section) | 4ft 10in (50cm Rear Section) | 6ft 6in (1m Rear Section)
Max. Lens Height (Overslung): 20ft 1in (30cm Rear Section) | 19ft 6in (50cm Rear Section) | 18ft (1m Rear Section)
Name: GF-Multi Jib
Payload: 18kg (30cm Rear Section) | 33kg (50cm Rear Section) | 60kg (1m Rear Section)

DescriptionText: The Mini Scorpio EZ Head offers incredibly smooth non-stabilised movements even at slow and high speeds. With a modular design and a 45kg maximum payload, the EZ head accommodates a variety of camera sizes and weights.

Mini Scorpio EZ Head can be controlled from up to 500 meters by cable serie RS485 or by wireless half-duplex microwave 2,4GHz
Using the new EZ Control (without display):
Limit, speed and Damping adjustment available.
Limits programmable, damping and speed adjustment for all axis available
All information transferable to a computer by 232
Name: Mini Scorpio EZ Head

DescriptionText: The Micro Scorpio Head is the smallest remote head in the Scorpio line. The light, compact head features simplified mechanics (with cables instead of HD slip rings) and electronics (with one main servo board for both axes instead of one per axis).
Features: Independent axes connected by cable.
Micro Scorpio Head can be controlled from up to 500 meters by cable serie RS485 or by wireless half-duplex microwave 2,4 GHz.
All axes (Pan and Tilt, Foco, Iris and Zoom using the Scorpio Focus) are programmable and repeatable.
Name: Micro Scorpio

DescriptionText: The Scorpio Stabilised Head offers five axes of gyro-stabilization. DescriptionText: The Scorpio “Stab V” head offers a wide range of motion with fast adjustments and weather-resistant stability. Its pan axis revolutions can traverse 360 degrees in 3 seconds, enabled by HD slip rings for quick movements capable of following an action-packed shot.

DescriptionText: The Mini Scorpio Stab V builds on the legacy of its full-sized counterpart, featuring advanced gyros, mechanics, and software to deliver exceptional stabilization in a smaller, lighter package. DescriptionText:
Laptop dolliy incl. pneumatic wheels, steering rod, track wheels, push bar, tripod tie downs, 3x 100mm bowls, Euro adaptera and Inlay (PSLTD1)
Designed specifically by PROSUP for the Video / Film maker, who requires mobility with capacity and strength, the laptop dolly succeeds with this requirement.

Prosup designed the LapTop Dolly specifically for small Broadcast / Video teams. The dolly is made of CNC engineered aluminium and stainless steel. Camerman can mount the E-Jib onto the Dolly.

The original dolly size is 90x70cm (35.5x27.5") and thus it clears any door opening.  The ingenious folding mechanism allows the dolly to minimize in size and to fit a Pelicase.

The dolly comes with 3 pre-mounted 100mm bowls for low shots. Straight travel shots are secured by a track locking mechanism.

The LapTop Dolly can take a camera person with the swivel support or a tripod with the tripod tie downs or a pedatsal column via specially made adapters.

The turnstile can be mounted to facilitate a swivel of 360° around the centre post. Besides the standard centre position, the swivel support unit can also be mounted offset thus allowing the camera person for additional moving space.The riser sits on the Euro mount of the swivel and comes with a 100mm bowl on the top. Via the 100 to 150mm adapter, bigger fluid heads can also be mounted.

The riser and the seat can be extended and locked to the most convenient position. Pedestal Columns Removable columns of the most popular pedestals can also be fitted on the LapTop Dolly. The necessary adapters and receptacles are available in the Prosup accessory range. Thus the dolly is a great solution for any OB work with diffcult floor conditions. The packing concept of the LapTop Dolly is really unique.

On three levels all necessary accessories can be stored away:

- Bottom: air tyre set and tie downs for rock-solid lock of a tripod to the dolly

- Middle: track wheel set for straight and curved tracks, push bar to be mounted on either side of the dolly, steering lock for track mode and straight ahead travel, space for Euro mount and air pump.

- Top: the folded LapTop Dolly platform

Fully loaded and including the case the unit comes to over 40kg (90lbs) while the dolly itself weighs in with a mere 15kg (33lbs)
Name: Prosup Laptop Dolly

DescriptionText:
Introducing Ronford Baker's new lightweight portable slider. The slider comes complete with removable and adjustable ‘ARRI’ standard rosette mounting legs, adjustable magnetic carriage stops and quick release carriage plate. Configurable without using any tools, you will be able to use either a 100mm or 150mm bowl mount options both on the top and underneath the slider.

There is also a flat plate option forusing attaching a quick release or dovetail plate.The slider carriage runs on precision ground stainless steel rails to ensure a smooth andsilent operation. 3/8” mounting points are available along the centre of the slider to helpmount on a tripod using either a 100mm or 150mm levelling ball. The slider can also bemounted onto monopods or lighting stands.

Optional 32mm clamps on rosettes and tube kit is also available. Protective impact & shock resistant wheeled case (available separately).

carriage travel, with a minimum height of 4 ¾” (12 cm). Mitchell to Mitchell fitting, with an overall width of just 10″ (25 cm). The whole unit has a lockable rotation of 360 degrees.

Ultra high precision, ground stainless steel runners and rollers.
Features: 360 degree lockable rotation
‘Soft stop’ adjustable buffers or adjustable magnetic stops
Available in length from 640 mm (25″) to 2440 mm (8’)
‘Tritium’ spirit level
Mitchell to Mitchell fitting & 150m/m Bowl available for top
Linear damper available
Name: 3ft Ronford Baker Slider

DescriptionText: The 2 Axis Libra is a remote camera head designed using the trusted framework of the original Libra head, but streamlined into a compact two-axis configuration. Equipped with pan and tilt stabilization while omitting a roll axis, it is the ideal choice for shooting in tight spaces or scenarios where a third axis is unnecessary. Despite its reduced axis count, the head maintains the same exceptional build quality as the full Libra system, ensuring reliability and smooth operation in a more compact form.
Name: Libra 2-Axis (Barry)

DescriptionText:
Gyro Motion is proud to introduce GENESIS — our patented gyro-stabilized head, setting new standards in stabilization and user friendliness.
 
This head is the result of a process involving years of experience, engineering talent and the ambition to create a perfect system without the usual drawbacks of conventional open frame gimbals.
 
The new head architecture, electronic design, software and control solutions allowed for us to create a system that provides exceptional accuracy and has no limitations in terms of stabilization and control.
Features: Gimbal always maintains correct polarity of the control axes regardless of the orientation of the mounting point.
4-axis design eliminates gimbal lock in any orientation.
Two control modes: relative the earth horizon and relative the camera axes.
Motion recording and playback (3 min).
High stabilization accuracy provides excellent stable picture for lenses up to 500 mm for wide range of payload inertia.
No limitation 360-degree continuous pan, tilt and roll control.
Programmable limits, tilt safety limits, auto reverse of tilt control direction.
Slip ring SDI and camera power channels through all axes.
Back pan compensation: 3 axis work mode; adjustable horizon ±180-degree.
Eliminates need for a levelling head.
Built in platform to supply camera power.
Name: Genesis

DescriptionText:
The 3-way leveller comes with a Mitchell top and a Euro coupling fitting, to level your remote head or your geared head to a maximum of 15 degrees
With Mitchell top
Standard Euro couple fitting
Aluminium handle with stainles steel insert
Adjustable levelling balls
Aluminium parts are powder coated or hardened anodized
Name: Three-Way Leveller

Features: Upto 90º tilt
Name: Mitchell Adjustable Tilt Riser

DescriptionText: Now you have a solution to adjust the height of your camera from 2.5" closed to 4" maximum height. The riser snaps into the Ronford Baker Large Quick Release Plate and is supplied with two 3/8" camera screws. Perfect for car rigging or for macro shooting where you need a quick and smooth height adjustment.
Features: Adjustable height: 2.5 - 4 inches
One (1) spoke hand wheel to rise and lower height
Four (4) tension levers to secure the position of the height
Riser snaps to Ronford Baker Large Quick Release Plate (sold separately)
Two (2) 3/8" screws
Suitable for minute height adjustments (e.g. macro shoots, car rigs)
Name: Quick Release Adjustable Riser (2.5 - 4")

DescriptionText:
Eco Clips for VFX film set building. Designed for the convenience of film studio set-builders the new reusable Eco Clip is pre-coloured and ready to use…again and again.

Easy to use, gentle on the fingers and with no more painting or taping of metal Clips, the new Eco Clip is sure to save you time and money in the long term.
Features: Available in blue, green, black and white.
Name: Eco Clips

DescriptionText:
The Applebeam system is a time saving support method incorporating alloy extrusions and scaffold tubing.

Being fully adjustable they can be set up to suit both Crane track and dolly tracks, or used as a simple rostrum.
Name: I Beam System

DescriptionText:
Weighing only 16 kg with a slim 236 mm carbon fiber column, it lifts up to 32 kg with 800 mm travel. With an outstanding speed of 1 m/s – faster than comparable systems – it sets a new standard for dynamic camera movement.

Designed for maximum flexibility, the GF-NEO Column can be operated both over-slung and under-slung. It’s driven by a powerful 48 V system for quiet, smooth, and reliable performance across film, broadcast, live events, and modern content creation.
Name: Neo Column

DescriptionText:
The GF-Tri Hat is a compact and versatile camera mounting solution, designed for maximum stability in minimal space. With its three foldable legs, the Tri Hat can be positioned securely in tight corners, on narrow platforms, or directly on the floor.
 
Each leg is equipped with either a 48.3 mm (1 ½") or a 42.4 mm (1 ¼") clamp (Please select) allowing for quick and precise height adjustments. The base plate supports standard GFM inserts, including Mitchell, 150 mm, and 100 mm bowls, offering full compatibility with a wide range of camera heads.
 
All components are CNC-machined from high-grade aluminum and treated with GFM’s patented hard-coat anodizing for durability and long-lasting performance.
Name: Tri-Hat

DescriptionText:
Each GF-Dual Offset Rig configuration includes a set of Height Adjusters. The 150 mm Bowl Top Mount comes with two large Height Adjusters, whereas Mitchell Plate & Mitchell 4-Way Plate come with two small Height Adjusters.
 
Additional Top Mounts (including a second set of Height Adjusters if required) are available on request.
 
Note: Mitchell Top Mounts can be used with Height Adjusters or flat.
Name: Dual Rotating Offset

DescriptionText: STANLEY FATMAX® XTREME™ box beam levels have been designed to provide durability and accuracy, providing you with the performance you need for every job. The patented continuous edge enables the ability to draw or scribe uninterrupted lines along the full length of the level. The fine milled primary edge provides 0.5mm/m accuracy, with a secondary edge accuracy of 0.8mm/m. The fully secured vial technology is designed to protect the vials against drop damage, while the 90% larger plumb vial provides an easier-to-see bubble for better visibility. The shock absorbing end caps are rubber moulded to protect the level from drop damage and feature raised anti-slip surface protectors to help protect against slipping and surface marking. Additionally, the end caps can be removed, making 90-degree markings and corner lines easier and more accurate. Strategically placed finger grab rails and wrap around handed grips are also incorporated for easier one handed use and better ergonomic design. Magnetic versions of the levels are available for specialised applications such as drywall construction and are equipped with stronger rare earth magnets than previous models.
Features: ALUMINIUM BODY: Robust extruded aluminium profile
REMOVABLE END CAPS: Allows end user accuracy and precision due to easier 90° angle/corner access
SHOCK ABSORBING END CAPS: Rubber moulded to protect the level from drop damage
FINE MILLED LEVELLING EDGES: Provides 0.5mm/m primary edge vial accuracy & secondary accuracy of 0.8mm/m
GRIP ACCESS AND ONE-HANDED USE: Ergonomically designed grip rails and handles for easy one-handed use
ANTI SLIP SURFACE PROTECTORS: Raised rubber profiles on the end caps helps protect against slipping and surface marking
Name: FATMAX XTREME 90cm Box Beam Level

DescriptionText:
The Proaim Mitchell to Mitchell/Euro Mount 4-Way Leveller is an ideal choice to quickly and easily level your heavy camera setups with precision.

Perfectly suited with Mitchell/Euro risers, tripods, bazooka, dollies, cranes, etc.

High-Grade CNC Aluminum construction ensures secure fitting and carries payload up to 80kg / 176lb.

The versatile design comes with Mitchell and Euro/Elemac base mounts.
The hardened aluminum surface and ergonomic knurled knobs make the Mitchell 4 Way Leveller sturdy and easy to handle.
The Leveller can tilt up to the angle of 7°.

The Anti-Slip 4 Levelling Knobs assist in micro-levelling of the camera setup.

Possibility of swivelling and Quick-Lock mechanism offers quick, easy and secure assembly.
Features: Low-profile
Name: Four-Way Leveller (Mitchell & Euro)

Features: 12” offset from Center
Name: ROM-1 Rotating Offset 4 Way Camera Leveller

Features: Converts to Bowl-Euro, Bowl-Mitchell, Euro-Mitchell, Mitchell-Bowl, etc.
Name: Multi Adapter Kit (Mitchell – Euro/Elemac - Bowl)

DescriptionText:
Frame your shots quickly and freely with Proaim Mitchell Wedge Tilt Camera Mount - An ultimate tilt & level solution to position your camera.

Smartly designed for over & under-slung tracking & static shots. It has an adjustable centre of gravity for optimum camera balance and a flexible tilt range of 0°-105° with secure locking at all angles. It gives you Dutch Tilt, Underslung shots with low-angle views and let you control your fluid head more than you usually can. Proaim Camera Mount is constructed of High-grade Aluminum that allows it to hold a 100kg / 220lb payload; it has enough strength to accommodate the tilt positioning of heavier setups.

Proaim Wedge Tilt Camera mount is compatible with industry-standard Mitchell fluid heads and Proaim Mitchell to Bowl adapters for mounting Bowl fluid heads.
The multiple free holes on the base plate make it highly compatible with the standard grip-cheese plate.
The base mount also adapts Proaim Mitchell Castle Nut for additional setup needs.
Name: Mitchell Wedge Tilt Camera Mount

DescriptionText:
When it comes to your filmmaking endeavors, there's no room for settling. Your setup and filming needs deserve spot-on solutions that leave no room for compromise. Presenting master shapeshifter— our Marcus Dolly that effortlessly shapes itself to maneuver it from a tight corner of the room or spread its wings to provide supreme support to a wide range of payloads. From Hi-Hat and Bazooka Base to Tripod Base, Skater & Track Dolly, this versatile companion excels in every role it undertakes.

With a Bazooka base featuring a robust Mitchell base and an additional Euro adapter base, our camera dolly seamlessly adapts to your filming setup. Whether you prefer using a Euro or Mitchell-based setup, our dolly gives you the freedom to choose.

Trust in the Bazooka Dolly's robust design. It can shoulder a whopping 453kg/1000lb of camera gear, offering you the sturdiest platform for your setups so you can create with no limitation.

Marcus Dolly boasts a robust three-leg design crafted from high-grade CNC aluminum, offering excellent strength and rigidity, meeting the highest performance and reliability standards for professional filmmakers.

Achieve Hollywood-quality tracking shots effortlessly. Our detachable track wheels ensure your camera glides gracefully, capturing every moment with utmost precision.

The red-colored cam wheel is designed to handle minor track imperfections and inconsistencies in wheel placement on the track by covering up any slight differences in the CD, making sure everything glides along seamlessly.

You can easily attach your spiked feet tripods to our Marcus Dolly by utilizing our specially designed spiked feet, featuring the convenience of secure locks to firmly fasten those spiked feet in place and confidently anchor your setup.

If wheels are not your preferred choice, you have the option to use height-adjustable feet that ensure you get the perfect shot, even on uneven surfaces.

Utilize the 48mm rod provision in an included adapter to easily incorporate extra accessories and tailor your dolly to suit your specific configuration, whether it's for navigating staircases or exploring many other creative possibilities. Note: You need the included adapter to attach feet or wheels to your Bazooka dolly.

The Marcus Dolly collapses effortlessly, making it easy to pack and transport. Plus, you won't need any tools to set up and operate this shape shifter.
Name: Bazooka Base

DescriptionText:
The Proaim Skateboard features a Split Carriage Design which ensures friction-free & smooth turning on Curved Tracks. Two Carriages have 4 wheels on each instead of the traditional 8 wheels per carriage design which helps all 32 wheels to maintain contact with the tracks even during turns.

Custom Made 100% sealed ball bearings provide extremely smooth dolly movement. These ball bearings have been designed to withstand heavy loads and function incredibly well. The wheel carriages are articulating, adjust quickly and easily to variations in Track Curvature for a very precise & smooth dolly movement.
Features: Compatible with straight and curved track
Name: Skate Troughs

DescriptionText: The GF-Low Rocker provides, on the one hand stable, low level, camera pan and tilt movements. On the other hand, it is a very solid camera mount for securing the camera in fixed positions (e. g. on a camera car).
Features: Extremely Solid Pan and Tilt Locks
Left and Right-hand Handle Positions
3-Way Levelling Base
Name: GF Low Rocker

DescriptionText: The UK's favourite bullet point permanent marker
Features: Robust aluminium barrel
Bonded fibre tip retains its bullet shape
Will write on almost any surface, including cardboard, metal, wood, plastic and glass
Approx line width 2.0mm
Name: Pentel N50

Features: Perfect for marking Fishier dolly arms
Name: Chinagraph

DescriptionText: Dirteeze Rough & Smooth professional MULTI - PURPOSE heavy duty wipes have market leading performance. 3X stronger and twice as thick as competing wipes there is nothing better on the market. Dual sided with a rough micro beaded side to agitate stubborn grime and a smooth side for wiping away means even the toughest jobs can be handled. Dirteeze Rough & Smooth professional MULTI-PURPOSE wipes are highly absorbent, made from spun lace, they can be wrung out and reused. Anti Bacterial and moisturising they are made with a high biodegradable content ensuring kind to the environment when disposed. Suitable for removing OIL, GREASE, LUBRICANTS, ADHESIVES, INKS, PAINTS, SILICONE SEALANTS AND MUCH MORE.
Name: Multi Purpose Industrial Cleaning Wipes

DescriptionText:
SCRUB STUBBORN MUCK OFF YOUR HANDS AND TOOLS - Big Wipes Heavy Duty Pro+ industrial wipes swiftly remove paint, oil, sealants, PU foam, and more for clean hands and tools on the go, while keeping them smelling fresh with a sports active fragrance!

DUAL-SIDED 'SCRUB AND CLEAN' FABRIC – packed with 4x powerful cleaning solvents each of the heavy-duty work wipes has a textured side for stubborn grime and dirt removal and a smoother side to soak up excess muck and moisture quickly

INDUSTRIAL BY DESIGN - with a tear-resistant and non-slip construction that doesn't pill, our durable industrial wipes are designed to tackle the toughest grime, whether cleaning up at the start or end of a job. Each tub contains 100 wipes

SKIN MOISTURISING - your hands are your most valuable tools - nourish and protect them in the harshest industrial environments. Dermatologically tested & non-toxic with Aloe Vera + Vitamin E. Free from parabens, phosphates, sulphates & formaldehyde

HEAVY-DUTY CLEANING FOR TRADESPEOPLE - since 2003, Big Wipes has been helping millions of professionals save time every working day thanks to a range of industrial cleaning wipes, sprays and specialist mobile cleaning solutions
Name: Heavy Duty Wet Wipes

DescriptionText: These eco cloths will give you a clean finish like you’ve never experienced. Our high quality and hard-wearing blue microfibre cloths work wonders on all areas to leave a streak free shine without any traces of fluff or lint.
Name: Glass Microfibre Cloths

DescriptionText: Refreshing Citrus fragrance. Multipurpose product suitable for all water washable non-food contact surfaces. Cuts through grease and grime. Active foam assists thorough cleaning. Effective sanitising action leaves all surfaces hygienically safe and clean. Ozone friendly. Does not contain chlorofluorocarbons
Name: Foam Cleaner

DescriptionText:
Powerful multi-surface anti-static foam cleaner that rapidly breaks down and removes grime. Great for vehicle interiors with an apple fresh fragrance.

Action Can FC-90 foaming cleaner is a specialist blend of detergents and anti-static additives which displays unrivalled cleaning on vehicle upholstery, trim, and panels. The foam breaks down and penetrates grime and dirt for easy removal, leaving a clean, apple fresh fragrance in vehicle interiors.
Features: Safe for use on plastics, metals, glass and a wide range of materials.
Name: Foam Cleaner

Features: Allows Fisher Dolly to go on Ice
Name: Fisher Ice Skates

DescriptionText:
Customise your dolly marks with a logo or initials. They come in a set of 6 with hard velcro already applied to the back ready to go. Available in 16 colours!

If a colour you’d like isn’t listed feel free to ask and we will try to get it for you. You can even mix up two colours for the set if you’d like!
Name: Custom Dolly Jib Marks

DescriptionText: Marks for dolly height positions, a set of 6 in your choice of 4 colours.
Name: Standard Dolly Jib Marks

DescriptionText: The Multi Head it is designed for all 5/8" rigging needs. Lighting, grips and props will all be able to find tons of uses for this great new tool.
Name: Multihead

DescriptionText: The Multi-Facet is an item that's usefulness is only limited by your imagination. We originally intended it to attach to the top of camera to provide many different mounting spots for any accessories you may have, on board monitors, eyelights, focusing devices or as spot for the grips to use to lock down the camera for locked off shots.
Name: Multi-facet

DescriptionText: Dado is a revolutionary junction that allows a number of attachments to be compatible with our entire range of Manfrotto Lighting clamps and stands. Dado is simple to use, and features an innovative design. Dado comes in two kits: one with 3 tubes, 3 threaded pins and 1 sphere and another one with 6 tubes, 6 threaded pins and 1 sphere.
Features: Cheese Plate Style Connector with 3/8'' Female Receivers
Versatile tool to attach different connectors at one location
Compatible with Manfrotto clamps and stands
Includes 6xTubes and 6x Threaded pins
Name: Dado Universal Junction Kit

DescriptionText:
Ultra high precision slider available in in lengths from 25” to 96”.  Supplied with precision ground stainless steel runners and rollers, 360 degree lockable rotation and adjustable magnetic stops.  Mitchell, 150m/m or 100m/m top fittings, support bars and slider friction units also available.

The Ronford-Baker Slider is available in many lengths and can be made to your specific requirements.

The slider is CNC machined from high tensile aluminium stress relieved ‘Tooling Plate’, and anodised to suit. Designed for maximised
carriage travel, with a minimum height of 4 ¾” (12 cm). Mitchell to Mitchell fitting, with an overall width of just 10″ (25 cm). The whole unit has a lockable rotation of 360 degrees.

Ultra high precision, ground stainless steel runners and rollers.
Features: 360 degree lockable rotation
‘Soft stop’ adjustable buffers or adjustable magnetic stops
Available in length from 640 mm (25″) to 2440 mm (8’)
‘Tritium’ spirit level
Mitchell to Mitchell fitting & 150m/m Bowl available for top
Linear damper available
Name: 3ft 6in Ronford Baker Slider

DescriptionText:
The P+S Skater Skater Mini is a great miniature compact and lightweight camera dolly, designed to work with smaller cameras such as the RED dragon and ARRI Alexa.

This dolly allows for an incredibly low-level shooting perspective with precise tracking, in any direction.
Features: Built and ready to use out of the box
Heavy duty designed for smaller cameras
Precise straight or curved tracking shots
Very quick set up
Useable on any flat surface and in any location with a mounted board
Name: P+S Technik Skater Dolly

DescriptionText:
The Creeper Butt-Dolly was invented by I.A.T.S.E local 80 key grip, Carlos Boiles for low-angle handheld camera work.
It is height adjustable, using a simple system of various length riser rods which are variably adjustable in seconds.
It's effortless, ultra-smooth,
silent operation is the result of years of research and development during his time spent as a dolly grip on major television shows.
​
Each Creeper is built by hand in Los Angeles, California. There are currently hundreds of units in use around the globe.
Features: Height adjustable
Name: Creeper Butt Dolly

DescriptionText: A low hat is a camera support used in the TV and film industry to provide stability for cameras at low angles. It consists of a flat platform with adjustable legs, allowing for precise positioning and movement during shooting.
Name: Low Hat

DescriptionText:
We make our boxes by hand and nest all 4 sizes into a single, full size box! As a product built with natural resources, we offer the industry a solution that is better logistically, ergonomically and environmentally. No other boxes are as practical or featured packed, than a Tree-Box. A product designed by crew, for crew. We are proud to make a product trusted by rental houses and grips.

Every TREE-BOX funds the World Land Trust in the nurturing, planting and protection of a whole new tree.

Our construction and packaging uses 100% biodegradable/Recyclable products.

All our adhesives, stains and varnishes are water soluble, free of solvents and VOCs.

When our product reaches the end of its usage, it won’t harm the planet.

We return more trees than we need.
Features: Spigot and thread - Located in the middle of the pancake is a 3/8” thread that is installed during the wood bonding process. Spigots and grip can screw directly and very securely into the panel. Creating versatile support options for lighting, lower than any dedicated low-stands.  Protects sensitive surfaces from heat or damage.

Grip Holes and Slot - Our full size box allows two-handed carrying, in flat or vertical positions. This prevents an inverted carry and promotes safer posture lift. They’ve also been designed for the pass-through of tie down straps. Strap in either flat or vertical orientations. No other nested box product offers these features.

Umbrella support - A standard, large camera umbrella hole is located on the lid of a TREE-BOX. It can be accessed by removing the pancake. This ensures the maximum weight will remain in the box. A receiving hole in the base of the box keeps the umbrella well positioned. Crew can sit comfortably, shaded and dry.
Slip mat
Compact - When space is a premium, who doesn’t need more of it? Our boxes maximise space and keep a full set conveniently contained for transit or on a shelf.
Name: Nested Apple Boxes

DescriptionText: Used for packing up track, furniture and anything else on set.
Name: Paganini Stack

DescriptionText: A device for fine-tuning the three-way rotation angle of the camera. Designed to accept all standard Mitchell-fitting geared / fluid / remote heads.
Name: Three-Way Leveller

DescriptionText:
A scaffold tube cross-bore holder, with a 3/8” threaded hole in the centre for attachment of support / accessories.

As with all Moy products it is made of premium quality materials – an aluminium polished body, chrome-plated steel socket with stainless steel clamp, and easy to access large Kipp locking handles for socket.
Name: MOY Bazooka - Scaffold Tube Holder

DescriptionText: A joiner designed to connect dolly track sleepers together.
Name: Track Joiner

DescriptionText:
Uncompromised design, built for raw performance at the limits of cinema.  

TITAN was built from the ground up with unwavering commitment to performance and robustness in its DNA.  From a unified 6061-T6 billet aluminum mechanical structure to IP65-rated electronics and patented high torque slotless motors- every aspect of TITAN represents the bleeding edge of gyro stabilization.
Features: Water Resistant
Name: Titan

DescriptionText: Manfrotto suction cup fitted with Avenger ball-joint & 16mm spigot. This enables fast and secure rigging of lightweight cameras & lighting to vehicles, windows and other flat/non-porous surfaces. We can also supply a set of three Manfrotto F1000 suction cups which can be combined with a rigging kit to form a secure car mount for larger cameras.
Features: 16mm spiggot
Name: F1000 Suction Mount

DescriptionText: The Youngman Boss X3 vertical scissor lift is a low-level push around access platform with a working height of 4.55m. This platform is designed for a variety of low-level applications including general maintenance, cleaning, painting, fit strip out work. It is ideal for use on construction sites, factories, transport environments, retail outlets and offices.
Height: Working Height: 4.55 m | Maximum Platform Height: 2.55m
Name: 4.5m Scissior Lift (Model: Boss X3)

DescriptionText: The Dingli JCPT0607DCS 5.6m scissor lift is specially designed for building mezzanine aerial working. Its compact size and width (width 0.76m, wight 880kg) mean that it can easily fit in an elevator.
Name: 5.6m Scissor Lift (JCPT0607DCS)

DescriptionText: The Dingli JCPT0707DC is a compact electric scissor lift designed for indoor access hire in warehouses, factories and maintenance settings. With a maximum working height of 6.5 m and a safe working load of 240 kg, it comfortably carries two occupants and their tools. Its narrow 0.76 m width makes it ideal for navigating through tight aisles and doorways, providing a safe and efficient solution for working at height indoors.
Name: 6.5m Scissor Lift (JCPT0707DC)

DescriptionText: The electrically powered Genie GS-1932 7.8 metre scissor lift boasts quiet electric operation and is ideal for indoor and outdoor applications in tight spaces on ﬁrm, level surfaces.
Name: 7.8m Scissor Lift (GS-1932 E-Drive)

DescriptionText: The quiet, electrically powered Genie GS-2632 scissor lifts are excellent for indoor and outdoor construction, maintenance and installation applications on ﬁrm, level surfaces. They can reach a working height of 9.8 metres and feature non marking tyres.
Name: 10m Scissor Lift

DescriptionText: The Genie GS-3232 E-Drive scissor lift is an electric model with a working height of 11.5 metres making it ideal for operation in emission and sound-sensitive indoor and outdoor jobsites where space is limited. The Genie AC electric E-Drive system offers unmatched efficiency and runtime on installation, maintenance, and construction jobs, especially when a significant amount of driving is required.
Name: 11.5m Scissor Lift (GS-3232)

DescriptionText: The Dingli 1218RT offers a 12 m working height and a generous 454 kg capacity, making it ideal for access hire in demanding outdoor environments. With room for up to four people, it’s a versatile lift for construction, building works and large maintenance projects. Its rough terrain design, four-wheel drive and strong platform stability ensure safe operation across a variety of site conditions.
Height: Max Working Height: 12m | Max Platform Height: 10m
Name: 12m Scissor Lift (JCPT1218RT)

DescriptionText: The Genie GS-3246 scissor lift has a working height of 11.75 metres. Its compact dimensions and zero inside turning radius making it ideal for indoor and outdoor construction, maintenance, and installation tasks on level ground and in tight spaces. It has a state-of-the-art Genie AC electric E-Drive system that offers unmatched efficiency and runtime when a significant amount of driving is required.
Name: 12m Scissor Lift (GS-3246)

DescriptionText: The Skyjack SJ7135RT diesel rough terrain scissor lift has a working height of 11.75 metres. With crossover symmetrical four-wheel drive, these machines deliver maximum torque to all wheels for superior all terrain performance.
Name: 12m Scissor Lift (SJ6832RT Diesel)

DescriptionText: The Genie GS-3369 Bi-Energy rough terrain 11.75m scissor lift offers unmatched hybrid versatility and jobsite performance — with up to 35% gradeability. The operator has the choice to select generator or electric-only operation. Thanks to its reduced dimensions, it is ideal for indoor work in confined spaces.
Name: 12m Scissor Lift (GS3369 Bi-Fuel)

DescriptionText:
The e-Scorpion is a compact all-terrain electric vehicle designed to carry the Scorpio 45’ or the Scorpio 38’ to hard-access locations or any other location where the noise and the smoke emissions are not allowed. It has been designed considering the compatibility with the Scorpio equipment and the comfort of the technician, the operator and the driver.

The Vehicle
Based on a CARON vehicle, it has been modified to be 100% electric keeping the original gearbox to offer a wide range of low gears to reach unthinkable positions for telescopic cranes. The cabin of the e-Scorpion is articulated up to 20º respect the main body, facilitating the driving through rough terrain. Power steering, LED driving lights, 4WD and a status panel with all the information of the vehicle (batteries level, current consumption…) also eases the driving experience. For the rainy days, the connections of the car are IP67 certified, and the whole vehicle can be sunken in water bodies up to the wheel axes. Equipped with two winches (one in the front part, one in the rear part of the vehicle), there is no way to get stuck, and with a build-in hitch ball, it can tow all the accessories needed for the production. Although the e-Scorpion is not homologated to drive through open traffic, the design allows it to be transport inside a truck, even with the crane mounted on it.

The base platform:
The e-Scorpion base design allows to operate the arm from the ground allowing the arm to spin 270º at the maximum inclination of the telescopic arm. The base also has specific compartments for the arm weights or other accessories required for the arm operation. It has support points for the arm respect the column and locking points from the arm to the vehicle for safely transporting the arm to the required position.

Hydraulic system:
Once the e-Scorpion is on position, four telescopic levelling jacks operated by an independent hydraulic system can be used to stabilize the base to the ground. Four different hydraulic pistons level the telescopic column up to 12º respect the base. All the hydraulic system to stabilize and level the base is build in a modular compartment completely independent from the motion of the vehicle and the valves for the pistons can be either manually or automatically used with an external console. One hydraulic piston extends the three section column up to 766cm from the base platform even with the arm fully loaded up to 2000kg.
Features: 100% electric
Build-in charger (can be charged while operating the hydraulics or the arm).
4 gears forward, 4 gear backwards
16 reduction gears
4WD /RWD options
Articulated cabin up to 20º
Different wheels available
4 Removable 50V 100A Li-ion 4 batteries
Independent working modes: driving mode, hydraulic mode
4 hydraulic leveling jacks
4 hydraulic column leveling pistons
3 sections hydraulic column with 700mm of telescope.
Automatic or manual level operated by an external control
Independent leveling systems for the column and the base
48mm supports for platforms
Specific place for crane counterweights
Front and rear winch
Hitch ball build-in
Vehicle status screen
LED lights
Name: e-Scorpion

DescriptionText:
Functional and practical, the Magic Arm Kit is an essential part of any photographer’s or content creator’s kit. Made to the highest quality Italian standards, the tough and hard wearing aluminium material makes this all in one solution a highly dependable accessory.

Includes (1x) Magic Arm (143N).

A highlight of this product is its smart centre lever, especially made to lock for all three main movements during your photography and video work. This fast and secure solution gives you assurance that there won't be any unwanted slips or problems when you need to focus on getting that perfect shot.

The design of the Magic Arm balances strength with flexibility. Weighing a mere 1.7kg, the Magic Arm can securely hold weights up to 3kg while also extending to a maximum length of 53cm. With reliable features and uncompromised build quality, you can trust this kit to handle the most demanding of photography work.

Designed to give you everything you need in one bag, it includes a camera bracket, a super clamp, and a handy backlight base. All in all, this gives you the complete magic photo arm set.

Each end of this arm is equipped with a standard-size 16mm spigot which is Anti-Rotation Super Clamp 035 Compatible and features one 1/4” female thread attachment on one side and 3/8” female thread attachment on the other. In addition, the arm is compatible with a whole host of Manfrotto Lighting Accessories such as floor stands, Clamps, Camera Brackets and more. This gives you a fully compatible and functional magic photo arm you may take with you wherever you go. The perfect item of photography equipment to support LED lights, studio lighting and studio equipment, in fact just about anything in or out of the studio needed to be positioned flexibly and securely!
Name: Magic Arm with Lever

DescriptionText:
Achieve absolute control with the Variable Friction Arm. Manufactured to world renowned Italian standards, this trustworthy kit is up to the challenge.

Crafted from tough but lightweight aluminium, the portable nature of this photo variable friction arm makes it ideal for transportation between shoots. This gives you a fully compatible and functional magic photo arm you may take with you wherever you go.

This is the perfect item of photography equipment to support items such as LED lights, studio lighting and studio equipment, in fact just about anything in or out of the studio needed to be positioned flexibly and securely!

DescriptionText:
The RatHat is a lightweight, Mitchell mount, modular low hat system machined from high grade billet aluminium and delivered hard black anodised. It can alternatively be configured with a bowl interface too.

Weighing 1.4Kg (just over 3lbs) it is 70% lighter than the competition

The bases truncated triangular design makes it far easier to use wedges for levelling. Threaded holes on each corner allow the addition of optional levelling feet. This means you no longer have to rely on wedges that are easily knocked out of place in error! Quick and easy to install and remove in the field, the levelling feet allow you to adapt to your shooting environment efficiently.
The Rat Hat ships as standard in a low hat configuration. It’s modular design means it can be easily transformed into a high-hat configuration by simply adding 3x 100mm risers. You have the option of ordering these high-hat risers in addition to the standard risers, or have the Rat Hat configured as a high-hat only.
Custom anodising colours & engraving available upon request – please detail it in your order notes at checkout.
Name: Rat Hat

DescriptionText: Matthews CAM Tank is designed to accept all large format camera plates or direct mount to any large or medium format camera equipped with 3/8"-16 mounting holes. The CAM Tank was designed for extremely low shots, without taking away your ability to pan and tilt the camera. It is also used to achieve dutch angles when mounted to a fluid head, or shots designed to be pointed straight down off of a fluid head on a tripod or jib. The bottom of the plate has 17 strategically placed 3/8"-16 tapped holes spaced 1" apart, complying with Motion Picture Industry Standards. The system is CNC machined out of 6061 T6 aluminum, stainless steel hardware. The pan bearing uses a machined polyoqymethyline, delrin disk, which self-lubricates and has an endurance rating 100x more than any plastic. The tilt system uses 4 premium NSK deep grooved ball bearings, made in Japan. Both pan and tilt functions come with brakes for lock off shots and camera safety.
Name: CAM Tank

DescriptionText: The Kupo euro to mitchell 3-way leveler is constructed from precision black anodized aluminum with stainless steel threads allows you to have a fast and fine tune for leveling heavy camera setup. It features a euro female mount with a quick action lever w/m12 bolt on the base which makes it quick mount for top or upside down for any euro male adapter related gear into it. The standard mitchell female plate is on the top for mounting cameras with mitchell base adapter
Name: Three-Way Leveller

DescriptionText: The Kupo Nesting Apple Box Set features a space-saving design advantage, allowing pancake, quarter, and half apple boxes to be stored neatly inside the full apple box. Its innovative track design with magnets on one side panel enables you to effortlessly slide into the storage box and snap to lock the panel within seconds, making it ideal for storage and transportation. Crafted with 8-ply Baltic birch plywood and a natural finish, each box ensures durability and aesthetics. The track design enables smooth and secure sliding of the side panel, while the super strength magnets enhance stability. Please note that one side of the full apple box has a handle for easy grip, while the other side remains completely smooth. The side panel also features a 3/8”-16 thread female, allowing you to mount a baby pin with a 3/8”-16 screw for small lighting fixtures or other accessories. Elevate your grip equipment collection with the versatile and practical Kupo Nesting Apple Box Set.
Features: Nested Apple Box 4-in-1 Set features a space-saving design advantage.
8-ply Baltic birch plywood with a natural finish for durability.
Super strength magnets ensure stability.
Side panel equipped with a 3/8”-16 thread female for mounting accessories.
Innovative track design with magnets for easy and quick storage.
Name: Nested Apple Boxes

DescriptionText: The universal camera ball leveling head will support up to 34kg (75lbs). It features a 55mm dia. solid ball and tightening control knob that allows for quick and secure locking of the camera's position. The base is made of a 3/8in thick aluminum cheese plate measuring 8in (203mm) x 8in (203mm), and comes with the industry standard 3/8in mounting holes, spaced every 1in. The top mounting plate comes witha 3/8in (10mm) slot that is 100mm in length, allowing it to use a standard arri sliding base.
Features: Cheese Plate: Standard 3/8" Through Hole (1"X1")
Name: Universal Camera Ball Leveling Head

DescriptionText: A mini version of the universal camera ball leveling head that will support up to 9.5kg (21lb). Constructed from a solid 3/8in thick aluminum plate and 6in (152mm) x 5in (127mm) in size, the mini camera ball leveling head comes with a solid 45mm dia. Ball and tightening control knob. This allows for mounting a camera on a car door mount or hood mount easily and conveniently.
Features: Cheese Plate: Standard 3/8" Through Hole (1"X1")

DescriptionText:
These days, the challenge is to do more with less -- for less. That is why we came up with the Dana Dolly.

Designed for the times where you just want to do a little 6' to 8' dolly move without a lot of setup. The Dana Dolly is easy to set up, can be used with a variety of track options, and can be supported using standard junior stands, apple boxes, or the ground, whatever the shot requires.

Whether you're an established professional or just getting started, the Dana Dolly is a great solution for adding production value to your shoot. Designed to be flexible, affordable, and easy to set up. Designed by a key grip with over 20 years of experience in all types of production, the design is simple and practical. The Mitchell Mount can take all types of camera heads with available adapters.

The sixteen-wheel design with floating trucks provides a smooth glide. The track ends and center support can use any 1 1/4" pipe as a track: aluminum, stainless steel, etc. So, if you're on location and don't want to pack track, you can stop by a home center and pick up some pipe or conduit as an alternative to the Schedule 80 aluminum pipe we recommend for everyday use.
Features: Fast and Portable Dolly System
Soft Polyurethane Wheels
Made in the USA
Name: Dana Dolly

DescriptionText: A development of our highly successful MB12 Verticrane, the new MB24X sports the same triangular cross-section and guide rail arrangement, making for a smooth and robust camera crane. With clever engineering, we have managed to make the new MB24X 200kg lighter in fully loaded form than our standard MB24. The 3-point guide rail section support, giving it unique stiffness. The MB24X is equipped with a new foldable base, allowing it to go through narrow openings, and with its low turning radius to be positioned in tight spaces. The bases’ articulated arms allow them to be used on standard dolly tracks of 100cm and 62cm in width. The new MB24 X with its light weight, high load and reach capabilities and highly maneuverable base, makes it ideal for the broadcasting and film markets.
Name: MB24X
Scaffold Tube Double Mount for GF‑Slider
Levelling Head on Modulus-X™ & Cheese Plates

DescriptionText: Our new Universal Bearing Adapter is the perfect fit for the GFM Modulus-X Rotary Adapter or other bearings. It effortlessly connects Modulus-X to any other truss and additionally enables grips to build rotary rigs with traditional Truss systems.
Name: Universal Bearing Adapter

DescriptionText: Lightweight folding dolly
Name: Magic Dolly with Bazooka Column

DescriptionText: Based on the proven concept of the Classic Focus Dolly, the new Focus Dolly Light is a complete, lightweight, ultra-portable dolly for track use. The Focus dolly is a complete lightweight, ultra-portable dolly. It fits together in less than three minutes, and the design incorporates dual features. When closed down, the dolly becomes a portable flightcase, the push/pull handle functioning as the transport handle. The dolly track wheels or hard rubber wheels simply pop in the sockets of the dolly. The trackwheels, which operate on both curved and straight track, are stored inside the dolly case for transportation. The Focus Seat Support completes the focus dolly as a multi purpose package.
Features: Folding design
Name: Focus Dolly Light

DescriptionText:
The Skateboard Dolly is Egripment's platform track dolly for quick, multi purpose and easy use.

The cooperation between Egripment's designers and our end users resulted in the Skateboard Dolly with a strong platform with anti slip surface. The Skateboard Dolly is equipped with Egripment's high quality boogie wheels and can be upgrated with a push and pull bar. A euro coupling can be mounted on several locations on the board.

The Skateboard Dolly runs straight as well as curved track.
Name: Skateboard Dolly

DescriptionText:
Based on the proven features of the StarTrack Dolly (foldable), Matador Dolly, (Sliding push pull bar), Dinky Dolly, (4 wheel steering on both sides) and Focus Dolly (ultra-portable) the new "Universal" Dolly combines all the best features of all Egripment Platform dollies.

The "Universal" Dolly utilizes a completely new method of steering, it folds into a small and lightweight package that weighs only 16.8 kg / 37 lbs., it carries a very good payload of 200 kg / 440 lbs., offers a solid camera platform, and it offers steering from the back or the front side, both 2 wheel steering and also 4 wheel steering when very tight turns are required.

The minimum turn radius is only 85 cm/34 inches.
Name: Universal Dolly

DescriptionText: Raptor ISO gives your remote head extra horizontal smoothness. With integrated springs and adjustable dampeners on both the X and Y axes, your system stays balanced—helping you keep every shot level and clean.
Name: Raptor ISO5

DescriptionText: Raptor Air is custom-engineered to eliminate high-frequency vibrations and reduce low-frequency oscillations, making it an ideal choice for filming on both rugged terrain and smooth roads.
Name: Raptor Air

DescriptionText: The next cinema vibration isolator with dynamic range support up to 35kgs payload.
Name: C35 Vibration

DescriptionText: Raptor XY2 Vibration Isolator absorbs pulsations in the X & Y horizontal axis. Smoother shots without disturbing vibrations are the result.
Name: Raptor XY

DescriptionText: The Raptor Butt Dolly is a brand-new offering from Custom Easy that redefines camera dolly functionality for handheld operators. While traditional “butt dollies” have long been used in the film industry for achieving low-angle, dynamic shots on smooth or semi-smooth surfaces, the Raptor Butt Dolly takes this to the next level. With whisper-quiet operation, it provides unobtrusive, seamless motion, making it an invaluable tool for professional handheld filming.
Features: Height adjustable
Name: Raptor Butt Dolly

DescriptionText:
The GF-Turtle Base is the Swiss Army knife for every grip: versatile, compact, and built for durability.

It offers quick, tool-free setup and features a modular design, providing an empty side compatible with all GFM adapters, and multiple 3/8" threaded holes arranged in a cheese plate pattern for added flexibility.
Name: GF-Turtle Base – 3-Leg Version Set

DescriptionText:
The GF-Turtle Base is the Swiss Army knife for every grip: versatile, compact, and built for durability.

It offers quick, tool-free setup and features a modular design, providing an empty side compatible with all GFM adapters, and multiple 3/8" threaded holes arranged in a cheese plate pattern for added flexibility.

The 4-leg version takes things one step further, incorporating a fixed Mitchell plate that seamlessly supports the GFM Turnstile mount on the opposite side.
Name: GF-Turtle Base – 4-Leg Version Set

DescriptionText:
The GF-Grip Kit System is a multifunctional rigging tool for building various sized bazooka bases, track dollies, rolling spiders as well as customized camera mounts, built on set to suit the operational requirements.

The centre plate is available as Mitchell or Euro Adapter accepting Combi Rig tubes, Mitchell and Bowl mounts as well as adjustable and fixed risers. The complete kit fits neatly into one custom designed flight case.

The Extension legs come in four sizes and up to five of them can be connected to the centre plate at any one time. Various sized track or studio dollies can be built by adding skateboard or studio wheels.
Features: Mitchell and Euro Centre Plate options
Extension Legs in different sizes allow for different use cases
Castor Wheels, Skate Wheels and Vulkolan Track Wheels
Name: GF-Grip Kit

DescriptionText: Crossarms introduce another brush to the cinematographer's palette. Theymake it possible to move the camera off center and allow sweeping rotation in an extremely low or high position. They enable lateral, angular, round & square camera movement where tight focus can be held. Perfect for your table-top work and any complicated offset camera needs.
Features: Offsettable arm to add dynamic moves movement on 23 Jib Arm
Available in 7 lengths
Name: Cross Arm
